page.title: 21Ormskirk - a seat of learning
page.content:
Today Ormskirk has secured itself as one of the major seats of learning within England. Edge Hill College has been replaced by Edge Hill University and is known as one of the top establishments for teacher training within the UK. However it has expanded it course portfolio and delivers training in IT, business, law, sports and many other fields.

Much housing within Ormskirk has been converted to student accommodation - at the dismay of some of the local population. However a good proportion of the community consider that the students have invested a significant amount into the local economy and that the university has saved the town from oblivion and becoming another Liverpool satellite town.
